title: Loot bug
body: I can't unlock any of the loot i have, whether it's skins, champs, or whatever. I try to click to unlock them but the little window doesnt pop up

replies.body: Try relogging just in case of a syncing issue.  Otherwise, an unstable connection can fail to communicate with hextech so it's not possible to render any transactions.  You'll want to run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide just in case to fix this up, as it could continue to degrade and cause other issues as well.  Let me know if you have any questions!
